start.title: Bob
start.text: So uh… welcome to Lutefisk, man… and hope you enjoy the job… It's pretty chill, man…

tentative.text: He pauses and looks around tentatively.

surprised.title: Bob
surprised.text: I was kinda surprised you still moved here, 'specially with all that's happened.

why_move.title: Respond:
options_text: This was the only job I could get.

what_mean.title: Bob
what_mean.text: Oh… You don't know… Damn, man. They found a body in the river. Tough stuff, man…

only_job.title: Bob
only_job.text: Ah well, the economy these days, man… When things got hard here at the store, I used to go out to the river to think… Clear my head and all that.

spot.title: Bob
spot.text: Can't believe what they did to my spot, man…

ask_questions.title: You
options_text: Do they know who it is?

who_is_it.title: Bob
who_is_it.text: It was Mrs Holloway, she taught English at the high school. I didn't have her as my teacher, but I heard she was pretty strict, man…

where_river.title: Bob
where_river.text: Uh… I guess you don't know where that is yet.

map.text: He reaches behind the store counter and pulls out a map.

welcome_gift.title: Bob
welcome_gift.text: Here, it's my welcome gift, man. It happened right behind the abandoned lumber mill.

when_found.title: Bob
when_found.text: Hmm, I'm not sure, man… Maybe on Saturday? or Sunday… Definitely over the weekend, man.

check_out.title: Bob
check_out.text: Oh yeah, could you check these out for me?

tulips.text: He hands you a bouquet of tulips. You hear his phone buzzing in his pocket; he looks down at it.

exit.title: Bob
exit.text: Thanks, man… Anyways, I gotta go check some stuff out in the backroom. See you around, man…
